etusivu_page_description: Hi I'am Casper and I make stunning websites and performant React.js applications
header_section_teksti: I make stunning websites and performant web applications. I design and code using modern technologies that enable rapid development and scalability for large audiences. Please be in touch if you want to work with me.
about_nyt_teksti: I live in Helsinki. My passion for coding and web design started when I was setting up a status company that needed a website. Nowadays I write powerful web apps and design seamless user experiences. Iâ€™m looking for informal and creative environment where I can exceed mine and customers' expectations. In my free time, I enjoy snowboarding, photography and good company.
about_kehitys_teksti: I use modern web technologies such as React, Node and Webpack to make scalable web applications fast and flexible. I have a lot of knowledge of database-driven web services, map applications and content management systems.
myt_stack_teksti: Here are libraries, technologies and services, that I use daily, I choose best technologies for every project.
I make high performance web applications by utilizing open source libraries and the most advanced web services.
my_works_teksti: Here are a few websites that I have been working on.
work_cta_teksti: I'm currently looking for a full-time job as a javascript developer. You can reach me best by email or by leaving a callback request.
work_cta_verkkosivut_teksti: I make elegant and efficient websites for businesses and individuals. I produce customized web pages cost-effectively, according to the customer's needs. All my pages are easy to update and scalable for large numbers of users.
